segments.text: Mr . Johnson ’ s office . Cindy speaking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi , Cindy . It ’ s Michael Kurt . Is Mr . Johnson in ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I ’ m sorry , Mr . Kurt . He ’ s stepped out for a bit . Would you like me to have him call you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , that ’ ll be great . I ’ m on extension 4283 .
segments.speaker: S2
